traceability.evidence: The implementation only filters the single “latest” version per package (in filterByAge and buildRows) and does not scan earlier versions to “work backwards until finding a mature version” as specified. There is no logic in fetch-version-times, buildRows, or applyFilters to examine older versions or adjust the recommended update to the newest mature release. Tests only verify filtering of the latest version’s age, not the smart backwards scan requirement.
traceability.notes: Smart filtering (REQ-SMART-SEARCH) is missing: the code does not iterate over prior versions to find the first one ≥7 days old, so the story is not fully implemented.
